Related Character(s): 苧
Связанный символ (и): 苧

芧字的基本解释

芧
xù
栎树；亦指栎实：“狙公赋芧。”

芧
zhù
三棱草，茎直立，三棱形。

芧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《集韻》象吕切，上語，邪。］
木名。即橡树，栎的一种。也指橡实。
[②]［zhù］
［《廣韻》直吕切，上語，澄。］
草名。即三棱。亦名荆三棱。

芧字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芧； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1020第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?同苧。　又【前漢·司馬相如傳】蔣芧靑薠。【註】芧，三稜也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?象呂切，音序。木名，栩也。　又芧栗。【莊子·徐無鬼】先生居山林，食芧栗。又【齊物論】狙公賦芧曰：朝三而暮四，衆狙皆怒，朝四而暮三，衆狙皆喜。李軌讀作羊諸切，音余。

芧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
芧字的起名意思

暂无。

small chestnut
Basic explanation of words
small chestnut
xù
Quercus; also refers to Quercus: "Published by the public."
small chestnut
zhù
Triangular grass, with upright stems, and triangular in shape.
small chestnut
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Ji Yun" resembles Lu Qi, Shangyu, evil. ]
Wooden name. Namely oak, a kind of oak. Also refers to acorns.
[②]［zhù］
["Guang Yun" Zhi Lu Qi, on the language, Cheng. ]
Cursive name. That is three-sided. Also known as Jing Sanleng.
small chestnut
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　芧; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1020 No. 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Same with Ram.　[Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Jiang Qianqian. [Note] 芧, three-sided also.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Like Lu Qi, sequence. Wooden name, Xu Ye.　Cherry again. 【Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui】Mr. lives in the mountains and forests and eats chestnuts. Also [Qiwu Lun] Gongfu Fu said: Three in the morning and four in the evening, all the snipers are angry, the four in the evening and three in the evening, all the snipers are happy. Li Gui is pronounced as Sheep Zhuqie, and the sound is surplus.
small chestnut
